Archer endo-tart your heart out

Step One

First, we need your nation name to continue. Enter it into the box and hit Next. Note that this must be in the nation you are logged into on NationStates.

Step Two

Now we need to find your Local ID. In the frame to the right, you should see your Settings page. Right click and view the frame source. Copy and paste the code into the box below and hit Start.

If you're having trouble getting the frame source, click here to open the Settings page in a new window.

Step Three

Click a nation to endorse it. Their nation page should appear to the right, indicating successful endorsement. To ensure success, wait until the frame loads the page before continuing.

made by Dylan. fork on github. not affiliated with NationStates.
